explanation: [0-0] The video starts with a sinister red chili pepper with a frown and sharp teeth against a black background, surrounded by blue lights.

[0-6] A green monster with sharp teeth and wide-open eyes slowly emerges from the left side of the screen, gradually opening its mouth to reveal rows of teeth. It slowly grows larger and approaches the chili pepper, which shrinks as the monster gradually devours it. Finally, the monster closes its mouth and gradually transforms into an apple. Its pupils spin rapidly, changing from round black pupils to X-shaped pupils.

[6-14] A giant red chili pepper slowly approaches the apple from the right side of the screen. The large chili pepper has X-shaped pupils and sharp teeth. The apple slowly turns to the left side of the screen. The chili pepper opens its mouth wide and gradually devours the apple. The shot zooms out, the chili pepper closes its mouth, its pupils rotate back to normal black pupils, and it looks straight ahead. The red chili pepper in the frame is the same as at the very beginning of the video.
